dsOverview.title: Monthly Northern Hemisphere 5-Degree Tropospheric Analyses, continuing from April 1947

summary.p: This dataset contains a time-series collection of monthly mean gridded Northern Hemisphere tropospheric data on a 5-degree latitude/longitude grid. This collection was assembled and computed by DSS from the daily grids of various operational models and meteorological projects. The daily grids are located in ds195.1.
